summary: A thriller about the passengers with different objectives on board a cruiser headed for China, being chased over and over again and unexpected happening of things.
cast: Chang Jung Lim|Daniel Choi|Dal-su Oh|Yun-hie Jo|Dal-hwan Jo|Ji-yoon Jeong|Young-hoon Lee|Seung-hwan Shin|Il-hwa Choi|Jae-hwa Kim|Moon-su Lee|Joon-seok Heo|Sang-Ho Yoon|Sung-taek Park|Il-mok Park|Hye-jeong Sin|Hyeon-mi Kim|Kim Gyu-Sun|Jeong-eun Kwon|Jeong-hwan Kong|Jamin Lee|Ye-seul Lee|Sang-jin Oh|Mi-ran Ra|Jong-hak Son
title: Gong-mo-ja-deul
